author: bakkutteh
description: Data Client to handle caching, updating, and storage of Clash of Clans data. Provides custom data extensions to integrate Clash of Clans data with Discord.
install_msg: The Clash of Clans API client cog should be loaded before this cog. This behaviour is handled automatically when rebooting.
end_user_data_statement: This cog caches Clash of Clans API responses, stores historical time-trended data, and interactions between Discord Users and Clash of Clans data.
